entries.name: Zlib::Deflate.new(level=DEFAULT_COMPRESSION, window_bits=MAX_WBITS, mem_level=DEF_MEM_LEVEL, strategy=DEFAULT_STRATEGY)click to toggle source
entries.desc: Creates a new deflate stream for compression. If a given argument is nil, the default value of that argument is used.

entries.name: << stringclick to toggle source
entries.desc: Inputs string into the deflate stream just like #deflate, but returns the Zlib::Deflate object itself.  The output from the stream is preserved in output buffer.

entries.name: deflate(string, flush = Zlib::NO_FLUSH)                 → Stringclick to toggle source
flush(flush = Zlib::SYNC_FLUSH)                 → Stringclick to toggle source
params(level, strategy)click to toggle source
entries.desc: Changes the parameters of the deflate stream to allow changes between different types of data that require different types of compression.  Any unprocessed data is flushed before changing the params.

entries.name: set_dictionary(string)click to toggle source
entries.desc: Sets the preset dictionary and returns string. This method is available just only after ::new or Zlib::ZStream#reset method was called. See zlib.h for details.
